name: The A.R.T.S. Loop
description:
Welcome to the Augmented Reality Testing Solutions HQ! I am the designated Proctor Artificial Intelligence or PAI for short! Please solve the puzzles and help make the world a more "Testable" place! Wait, something is wrong! DOES NOT COMPUTE! ERROR 404 - Level 2 NOT FOUND! 

Please rate the game on the Ludum Dare website if you can! Thank you for Playing!
